2021-11-17 22:35:24.145914 ==> SQL exec: select r.id, TRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + trim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', trim(r.comment) as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = {Const.YEAR}) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses
                where jc.year = ?  order by [День], k.name, r.tstart

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', trim(r.comment) as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = {Const.YEAR}) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses
                where jc.year = ?  order by [День], k.name, r.tstart

2021-11-17 22:35:41.792368 ==> SQL exec: select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Статусы', trim(j.comment) as 'Доп. информация', trim(j.usercomm) as 'Ученики', 
                     j.idGroups as 'IDG'
                from journals j

                where jc.year = ?  order by [День], k.name, r.tstart

                     j.idGroups as 'IDG'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', trim(r.comment) as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses
                where jc.year = ?  order by [День], k.name, r.tstart

2021-11-17 23:18:46.169991 ==> SQL exec: select r.id, TRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + trim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', trim(r.comment) as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses
                where jc.year = ?  order by [День], k.name, r.tstart
<===
2021-11-17 23:18:46.169991 ==> Params: (2021,)
Result: Ok

                     j.idGroups as 'IDG'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups

2021-11-17 23:19:06.362943 ==> SQL exec: select u.id, trim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
               join priv pp on pp.id = r.idPriv
               where pp.access like ?
         order by u.name

                     j.shtraf as 'Статусы', trim(j.comment) as 'Доп. информация', trim(j.usercomm) as 'Ученики', 
                     j.idGroups as 'IDG'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses
                where j.idGroups = ?  order by [Дата], [Время нач.]

               where pp.access like ?
         order by u.name

2022-08-30 20:33:55.482636 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j where j.idGroups = 45 order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 20:34:06.779178 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание',

2022-08-30 21:02:17.299372 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3  order by g.name

2022-08-30 21:02:17.755644 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 21:02:19.878902 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id

                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id where g.idUsers=15 and c.year=2021 order by g.id

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация',

                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'

                join days d on r.idDays = d.id

                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

2022-08-30 21:19:48.431926 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 21:19:51.021029 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 21:19:51.112542 ==> start try [update class]

                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j  order by j.date, j.tstart

                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

2022-08-30 21:19:59.713933 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id where c.year = 2022  order by g.id

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий' 
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers  order by id

2022-08-30 21:22:20.828184 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name

2022-08-30 21:22:21.247575 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 21:22:23.832971 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 21:22:33.073021 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2022-08-30 21:22:36.834068 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

2022-08-30 21:22:37.922034 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 21:23:59.322897 ==> Start try [update class] 
select g.id, rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', rtrim(u.name) as 'ФИО наставника',
                    g.idUsers, g.idCourses
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id  order by g.id
<===
2022-08-30 21:23:59.408694 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 21:23:59.569902 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.usercomm, j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 21:25:45.540852 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 21:27:38.958713 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.',

2022-08-30 21:27:40.568474 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', r.idPriv,  u.navigator
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id

select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name

2022-08-30 22:06:03.781312 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

2022-08-30 22:07:00.669930 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'

                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',

                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id

        			    join priv p on r.idPriv = p.id

2022-08-30 22:07:59.504666 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 22:09:24.572459 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id where u.id=15

2022-08-30 22:11:07.565176 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 22:11:07.650115 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idGroups, jc.acchour, jc.hday, t.idUsers
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by u.name
<===
2022-08-30 22:11:07.732591 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.usercomm, j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022
                                    and j.date between '2022-10-01' and '2023-01-01'  order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 22:11:07.830083 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                    trim(g.comment) as 'Доп. информация' 
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id where g.idUsers = 15 and c.year = 2022 order by g.id
<===
2022-08-30 22:14:57.273174 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where j.idGroups = -1 and jc.year = 2022 order by j.date, j.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 22:15:04.514229 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 34  order by g.name

                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t

select g.id, rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника', g.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id where c.year = 2022  order by g.id

                from group_table t

2022-08-30 22:39:28.565841 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21 and c.year = 2022  order by g.name

                from group_table t

2022-08-30 22:39:28.979307 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 22:39:31.656140 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 22:41:56.720838 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий' 
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers  order by id

2022-08-30 22:58:08.083466 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3 and c.year = 2022  order by g.name

select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',

                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers

                where t.idGroups = 0  order by u.name

2022-08-30 22:58:08.523034 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 22:58:10.977507 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

select g.id, rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', rtrim(u.name) as 'ФИО наставника',

2022-08-30 22:58:25.408530 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 22:58:25.502638 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.usercomm, j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

select g.id, rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', rtrim(u.name) as 'ФИО наставника',
                    g.idUsers, g.idCourses

2022-08-30 22:58:37.108229 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 22:58:37.205651 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.usercomm, j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idGroups, jc.acchour, jc.hday, t.idUsers
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by u.name

                from journals j

               from users u

                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', r.idPriv,  u.navigator
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id

2022-08-30 23:07:16.146361 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3 and c.year = 2022 where c.year = 2022 order by g.name

2022-08-30 23:08:24.245819 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 23:08:26.881317 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 23:08:50.141643 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника', g.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from groups g

2022-08-30 23:12:04.818724 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 3 and c.year = 2022  order by g.name
<===

                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id

              where g.idCourses = 3 and c.year = 2022  order by g.name

select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', p.comment as 'Класс',
                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t

2022-08-30 23:12:05.309025 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 23:12:07.786414 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                from journals j where j.idGroups = -1 order by j.date, j.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 23:12:16.160425 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

2022-08-30 23:12:19.608344 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',

                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022
                                    and j.date between '2022-10-01' and '2023-01-01'  order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 23:12:33.087448 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 23:16:00.188588 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21 and c.year = 2022  order by g.name
<===

              where g.idCourses = 21 and c.year = 2022  order by g.name

2022-08-30 23:16:00.435457 ==> start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', p.comment as 'Класс',
                    p.name as 'Уч.заведение'
                from group_table t
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join places p on p.id = u.idPlaces
                where t.idGroups = 0  order by u.name

2022-08-30 23:16:00.703128 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 23:16:03.466907 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 23:16:12.047028 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name

                    trim(g.comment) as 'Доп. информация'

                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id

2022-08-30 23:16:15.390710 ==> Start try [update class] 
select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

2022-08-30 23:16:15.693767 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 23:16:18.952588 ==> Start try [update class] 
select g.id, rtrim(g.name) as 'Группа', rtrim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', rtrim(u.name) as 'ФИО наставника',
                    g.idUsers, g.idCourses
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join courses c on g.idCourses = c.id  order by g.id
<===
2022-08-30 23:16:19.037838 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===
2022-08-30 23:16:19.122399 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.usercomm, j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

                from group_table t

select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание',

2022-08-30 23:16:27.241630 ==> Start try [update class] 
select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.', 
                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.present as 'Посещаемость', j.estim as 'Оценки',
                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where j.idGroups = -1 and jc.year = 2022 order by j.date, j.tstart

2022-08-30 23:16:29.258619 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups

select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id
<===
2022-08-30 23:21:57.968874 ==> Start try [execute command] 
select name from days order by id

2022-08-30 23:21:58.203804 ==> Start try [execute command]

2022-08-30 23:21:58.577446 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                    j.tend as 'Время оконч.', j.comment as 'Доп. информация'
                from journals j  order by j.date, j.tstart

                        join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
        			    join priv p on r.idPriv = p.id

2022-08-30 23:22:06.881082 ==> Start try [update class] 
select u.id, rtrim(u.name) as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.fam as 'Фамилия', u.ima as 'Имя', 
                u.otch as 'Отчество', u.login as 'Логин', u.phone as 'Телефон', 
                u.email as 'E-mail', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд', u.sertificate as 'Сертификат ПФДО',
                r.name as 'Роль', p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.',
                u.comment as 'Доп.информация', (select p.access from priv p where p.id = r.idPriv) as 'priv'
               from users u
               join roles r on u.idRoles = r.id
               join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id  order by u.name
<===
2022-08-30 23:22:09.855201 ==> Start try [update class] 
select g.id, trim(g.name) as 'Группа', trim(c.name) as 'Учебный курс', c.volume as 'Объем', 
                    c.lesson as 'Занятие', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника', 
                    trim(g.comment) as 'Доп. информация' 
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id  order by g.id

select t.id as 'id', g.name as 'Группа', u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', 
                    t.comment as 'Комментарий', t.idUsers as 'UID'
                from group_table t
                join groups g on g.id = t.idGroups
                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by u.name

2022-08-30 23:22:13.330067 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

select j.id, j.date as 'Дата', rtrim(j.name) as 'Тема занятия', j.tstart as 'Время нач.',

                     j.shtraf as 'Штрафы', j.comment as 'Доп. информация', j.usercomm, j.idGroups as 'idGroups'
                from journals j
                join groups g on g.id = j.idGroups
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by j.date, j.tstart

                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name

2022-08-30 23:23:23.397770 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 23:23:25.409690 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 23:31:47.936397 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name
<===

                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name

2022-08-30 23:31:48.423422 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 23:31:50.579655 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 23:32:13.651176 ==> Start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                from group_table t

                join users u on u.id = t.idUsers
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 and jc.year = 2022 order by u.name

                from journals j

select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name

2022-08-30 23:47:20.188462 ==> start try [update class] 
select distinct u.id as 'ID', 
                   (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idUsers = u.id) as '!', 
                   u.name as 'Фамилия И.О.', u.sertificate as 'серт.ПФДО',
                   p.name as 'Место учёбы/работы', p.comment as 'Класс/Должн.', 
                   u.phone as 'Телефон', u.birthday as 'Д.рожд',  
                   u.comment as 'Доп.информация'
                    from users u
                    join places p on u.idPlaces = p.id
                    left join group_table g on g.idUsers = u.id
                  where idRoles = 2   order by u.id

2022-08-30 23:47:22.394426 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

                    r.idGroups as 'ID Группа', d.id as 'ID День', jc.year as 'Уч.год',
                    ju.id as 'ID User', jc.id as 'ID Courses'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday, cu.year from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses  order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart

2022-08-30 23:49:06.476833 ==> start try [update class] 
select r.id, RTRIM(g.name) + ' - ' + rtrim(ju.name) as 'Группа - наставник', d.name as 'День недели' , 
                    k.name as 'Кабинет', r.tstart as 'Начало', r.tend as 'Окончание', 
                    jc.acchour as 'Акк. час', jc.hday as 'Занятий в день', r.comment as 'Доп. информация', 
                    r.idGroups as 'Группа', d.id as 'День'
                from rasp r
                join kabs k on r.idKabs = k.id
                join days d on r.idDays = d.id
                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id
                join (select cu.id, cu.acchour, cu.hday from courses cu where cu.year = 2022) jc on jc.id = g.idCourses where g.idUsers = 15 order by d.id, k.id, r.tstart
<===

                join groups g on r.idGroups = g.id
                join (select gu.id, u.name from groups gu join users u on gu.idUsers = u.id) ju on ju.id = g.id

select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 19  order by g.name

                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id  order by g.id

2022-08-31 00:20:38.457974 ==> start try [update class] 
select g.id, g.name as 'Группа', c.year as 'Уч.год', u.name as 'ФИО наставника',
                (select count(*) from group_table gt where gt.idGroups = g.id) as 'Кол-во детей'
                from groups g
                join users u on g.idUsers = u.id
                join (select * from courses where year = 2022) c on g.idCourses = c.id
              where g.idCourses = 21  order by g.name
